parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.08

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns final, recalculated sub skill value of given unit. (with regard to AI Level coefficient (Difficulty settings)).

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Since <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.40</value></part></template> the command works in multiplayer.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> unit [[skillFinal]] skillName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> skillName: [[String]] - See [[AI Sub-skills|sub-skill]]. Possible values are:
* "aimingAccuracy"
* "aimingShake"
* "aimingSpeed"
* "endurance" (Has no effect in <template><title>arma3</title></template>)
* "spotDistance"
* "spotTime"
* "courage"
* "reloadSpeed"
* "commanding"
* "general"

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_unitTrueCourage = unit1 [[skillFinal]] "courage";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[skill]], [[setSkill]], [[setUnitAbility]], [[CfgAISkill]], [[ArmA: AI Combat Modes|AI Combat Modes]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:AI]]</root>
